body.name: Clirass Elongated Bidet Toilet Seat with Quiet-Close, Non-Electric Bidet Toilet Seat with Self Cleaning Dual Nozzles, Fit Elongated Toilet Seat, White Bidet Attachment with Brass inlet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 4 mins
features: Bidet Toilet Seat: This white toilet seattoilet seat with bidet functionality measures (17.5"L x 14"W x 2”H) fits elongated toilets.It can save you a lot of toilet paper, and the bidet function allows you to use it with peace of mind, comfort and ease of use!

Bidet Function: Non-electric dual nozzles bidet parts, ergonomic water jet design, rear and frontal wash modes for you experience more comfortable cleaning. Self-cleaning mode cleans the nozzle before and after use for enjoy cleaning to your. The ideal water pressure and cleaning mode can also be adjusted during use.

Slow-Close Toilet Seat Lid：Slow-closing hinges prevents slamming. The seat closes slowly and quietly with a gentle pressure.This greatly reduces damage to the toilet lid when it is closed, prolonging the life of the lid and creating a peaceful bathroom environment. The bottom of the product also comes with its own non-slip bumpers, which helps minimize toilet seat shifting and sliding during use.

Easy to Installation：The product includes 1*Toilet seat bidet,1*T-adapter with pressure control and shut-off function，1*Stainless steel hose,and other accessories required for installation. Can be installed all by yourself in just 15 minutes.If you encounter any problems during installation, you can check the product's installation manual or installation video, there will be detailed steps to help you complete the installation.

Clirass: Clirass elongated bidet toilet seat provide refreshing cleaning experience for you. Whether you have any questions about the product will have a professional team dedicated to serve you! You can rest assured that you can take the product home and use it or give it as a gift to your friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Really Well
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how well this seat worked. It’s easy to set up and the directions are clear for the unfamiliar. Connections didn’t leak but be mindful not to over tighten fittings.I just ordered a second one being I like the first one as much. Definitely beneficial for those that have septic issues. Drastically reduces toilet paper consumption. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elongated Bidet Toilet Seat
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I made everyday use of this device, and the function that allowed it to shut quietly stuck out to me right away. Those sudden slamming noises are eliminated because of the regulated and gradual closure of the seat, which also contributes to a more tranquil atmosphere in the bathroom because of its presence. Providing an update that is both visually beautiful and functional, the bidet seat's extended shape is a seamless match to my existing toilet. Electric connections are not required since the bidet is powered simply by the pressure of the water. This not only makes the installation process easier, but it also guarantees that the energy efficiency is maintained, which makes it an environmentally responsible addition to my bathroom. In addition to ensuring the bidet's endurance and performance, the brass inlet is a trustworthy and long-lasting component that is included in its design. A hygienic experience is guaranteed each and every time since the nozzles retract and go through a process of self-cleaning after each usage. The adjustable water pressure and temperature settings enable a customized and enjoyable cleaning experience by adding an additional layer of personalization that responds to individual tastes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice integrated seat
reviews.reviewText: Before this I had the add on type to existing seat. The seat never closed right and the sprayer broke after 3 years. This style is much better because everything is one unit , looks better no more slamming toilet seat! Very happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bidet toilet seat is great really easy set up an install. Doesn’t move around like some of the others I’ve had an easy to use great for cleanup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came with everything I needed to mount it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First of all, this is unpainted plastic. So unlike what I have now, it should remain unaffected by bleach.The sprayer is perfectly aimed. It has a flip lid which protects the nozzle. Easy mount and plum for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall a great bidet, easy to install. Cold water only. A few minor issues
reviews.reviewText: First, I wish this had easy-off hinges. All toilet seats need easy-off hinges, for easy installation and easy cleaning.Also, this does not have hot water. It is cold water only. For me personally this doesn't bother me. I've used both kinds, and my bum barely noticed a difference. Plus, the hot water one that I installed leaked, causing a mess.However, other family members preferred the hot water kind, especially in the winter.Also, for women using the front cleaning function, they may prefer warm water to cold water. Just something to think about.I do prefer the front cleaning function. The females in my household said they didn't care about that function and wouldn't use it, then ended up loving it.For me, it is absolutely essential to have a quiet close lid that doesn't slam down (especially with kids at home). Fortunately this one has the quiet close.In principle, installation is the same as any other bidet - just add a diverter to your incoming water supply line, and the only tool you should need for installation is a wrench.In practice, though, this is probably easier to install because there are fewer pieces, and you don't have to worry about lining up the toilet seat with the bidet. You don't have to worry about compatibility, or having enough space. In one of our bathrooms, the added bidet actually touches the wall - with this design, you don't have to worry about tight spaces like that.4.5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and Efficient Bidet
reviews.reviewText: The bidet comes with everything you will need to install it. It fitted my elongated toilet perfectly and it was installed in as little as 30 minutes. First of all, make sure you shut down your toilet water valve and empty the reservoir. The adjustment to the toilet was very easy with the nylon screws, no tools required. The metal T-connector has an open-shut lever, in case you wish to shut the water supply to the bidet without affecting the operation of the toilet, very nice detail!After verifying that there were no leaks, the bidet was all set. The lid lowers itself very softly.The turning dial is very soft, it is very easy to adjust flow of the water jet and the specific nozzle (two).I would give this product six stars if they mentioned where to obtain the removable and replaceable nozzles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Americans don’t know what they’re missing not having bidets available. I installed a dedicated bidet during a bathroom renovation for my wife. It had hot water and she loved it and I came to appreciate it when I had “intestinal disorders” and was wiping myself raw with paper. It was a luxury that we lost when we sold that house. We spent too much on our new house and I can’t afford a full on bath renovation right now but my wife really wanted the bidet again. This is a very reasonably priced, easy to install, alternative. Total installation took me 20 minutes, mostly to loosen the very corroded old connections. Everything needed is included except the tools and it was easy even for me, a non-serious handyman. It functions as advertised and while I was worried the cold water might be “kind of shocking” it’s really not uncomfortable. My wife is happy. A hot water bidet is preferable but this is an excellent alternative if that’s not possible. Make sure your toilet is of the modern elongated design. I’d buy again and would recommend.
